title: Reflected DOM XSS on www.starbucks.co.uk

profile.name: Starbucks
profile.about: Premier purveyor of the finest coffee in the world, inspiring and nurturing the human spirit — one person, one cup and one neighborhood at a time.

summaries.content:
bayotop discovered a reflected DOM XSS on www.starbucks.co.uk.
@bayotop — thank you for reporting this vulnerability and for confirming the resolution.
